participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Resilient and hardworking, with a passion for baking and a strong family ethic.
participant_1.background: My family is poor, but we work hard to make a living. I'm very familiar with hospitals and doctors. I like the color green because it reminds me of fresh produce, which is a key ingredient in my cupcake business. I got my finger crushed in a machine when I was working at the factory. I'm the middle child of 3 siblings.

participant_2.name: Jasmine
participant_2.personality: Creative and energetic, with a love for music and cooking.
participant_2.background: Others will be envious of my vacation. I have a sweet tooth but I stay in shape. My worst fear is that I will lose my sense of humor. I am a rapper. I have to take allergy medication every time I grill for my family, but it's worth it because they love my food.

content.text: Hi, I got my finger crushed in a machine when I was working at the factory.
Hey, that's unfortunate! What kind of factory do you work at?
It was a cupcake factory, I was the only one working there at the time.
Oh wow, so you own the factory?
No, I just worked there. I'm the middle child of 3 siblings, and my family is poor.
I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you're able to get your finger fixed.
Thanks, I'm going to the hospital tomorrow.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a rapper, and I also run a cooking show on YouTube.
Oh wow, that's awesome! I love to cook.
Me too! I have a sweet tooth, but I stay in shape.
That's great! I'm just starting my cupcake business.
That's awesome! I hope it goes well.
